content:
MultiShardSchemaMismatchException Class

Definition

Custom exception thrown when the schema on at least one of the shards participating in the overall query does not conform to the expected schema for the multi-shard query as a whole.

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Naming", "CA1704:IdentifiersShouldBeSpelledCorrectly", MessageId="Multi")]
public class MultiShardSchemaMismatchException : Microsoft.Azure.SqlDatabase.ElasticScale.Query.MultiShardException
Inheritance
Exception
MultiShardException
MultiShardSchemaMismatchException
Attributes
System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage

Inherited Members

GetObjectData(SerializationInfo, StreamingContext)
ShardLocation
ToString()

Constructors

MultiShardSchemaMismatchException()

Initializes a new instance of the MultiShardSchemaMismatchException class.
MultiShardSchemaMismatchException(String)

Initializes a new instance of the MultiShardSchemaMismatchException class with the specified error message.
MultiShardSchemaMismatchException(SerializationInfo, StreamingContext)

Initializes a new instance of the MultiShardSchemaMismatchException class with serialized data.
MultiShardSchemaMismatchException(String, Exception)

Initializes a new instance of the MultiShardSchemaMismatchException class with the specified error message and the reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
